tp:treatment-sec.p:
† Hybodontes Agassiz 1843 Tome III : 206 (family) †
Hybodus Agassiz 1837
[latinized to † Hybodontidae by Owen 1846 ; latinized to † Hybodontes by Giebel 1846: 152 and Giebel 1847: 311 , latinized to †Hybondontini [†Hybodontini] by Bonaparte 1850a: 453 ; considered valid with this authorship by Bronn 1849: 650 , by Bleeker 1859 : XII and by de Koninck 1878: 26 Art. 11.7.2]
